A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: BIG time fan of the 'original' and magical trilogy of iv v and vi. I can see they have best intentions with the new trilogy they are setting out new characters and idea's -  but it's beginning to get repetitious and some things are becoming more nearer to the last trilogy attempt of i ii and ii.\nEven my kids were not THAT impressed and spotted the Cliches that are to apparent. Losing faith in Disney's attempts :(
